Acorn

Advanced data
NPC ID9415

Acorn is an unused non-player character added to the game in 2020. It is a transmogrification NPC, that the player can be transformed into, but does not appear normally in the game.

The Acorn was added to allow Jagex Moderators to transform themselves into Twisted bows in order to commemorate the anniversary of the Twisted bow glitch. On the anniversary of the glitch, the official Old School RuneScape account tweeted that they were aware of an issue east of the Farming Guild on world 302, and as they were working on a fix, asked players to avoid the area in the meantime.[1] When players visited the area, several Jagex Moderators were at the area, transformed into twisted bows as a joke.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The name and examine are a reference to Mod Acorn.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Old School RuneScape's Twitter account. (Archived from the original on 28 February 2019.) Old School RuneScape: "We're aware of the issue East of the Farming Guild on W302 and are working on a fix. Please avoid that area in the meantime."

'''Acorn''' is an unused non-player character added to the game in 2020. It is a transmogrification NPC, that the player can be transformed into, but does not appear normally in the game.

The Acorn was added to allow [[Jagex Moderator]]s to transform themselves into [[Twisted bow]]s in order to commemorate the anniversary of the [[Twisted bow glitch]]. On the anniversary of the glitch, the official Old School RuneScape account tweeted that they were aware of an issue east of the Farming Guild on world 302, and as they were working on a fix, asked players to avoid the area in the meantime.{{CiteTwitter|author=Old School RuneScape|url=https://twitter.com/OldSchoolRS/status/1233352529800572928|archiveurl=https://archive.is/i56ZJ|archivedate=28 February 2019|quote=We're aware of the issue East of the Farming Guild on W302 and are working on a fix. Please avoid that area in the meantime.}} When players visited the area, several [[Jagex Moderator]]s were at the area, transformed into twisted bows as a joke.

==Trivia==
*The name and examine are a reference to [[Mod Acorn]].
